content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 17}, {"type": "shears", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "milk_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_slab", "quantity": 46, "index": 29}, {"type": "snow", "quantity": 45, "index": 39}, {"type": "filled_map", "quantity": 41, "index": 40}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a diamond_shovel, I need to craft a diamond first. To craft a diamond, I need to place 9 diamond_block in a 3x3 grid in the crafting table. I will start by moving a diamond_block from slot 15 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "diamond", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 17}, {"type": "shears", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "milk_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_slab", "quantity": 46, "index": 29}, {"type": "snow", "quantity": 45, "index": 39}, {"type": "filled_map", "quantity": 41, "index": 40}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I have all the materials required to craft a diamond, I can craft it by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "diamond", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 17}, {"type": "shears", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "milk_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_slab", "quantity": 46, "index": 29}, {"type": "snow", "quantity": 45, "index": 39}, {"type": "filled_map", "quantity": 41, "index": 40}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I have crafted a diamond, I can craft a diamond_shovel by placing 1 diamond and 2 stick in the crafting table. I will start by moving a diamond from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 17}, {"type": "shears", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "milk_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_slab", "quantity": 46, "index": 29}, {"type": "snow", "quantity": 45, "index": 39}, {"type": "filled_map", "quantity": 41, "index": 40}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I have moved a diamond to the crafting table, I need to move a stick to the right of it. Slot 4 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move a stick to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 4 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 17}, {"type": "shears", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "milk_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_slab", "quantity": 46, "index": 29}, {"type": "snow", "quantity": 45, "index": 39}, {"type": "filled_map", "quantity": 41, "index": 40}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]

Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 7 with quantity 1
